name: Raid on Bungeling Bay
summary: Raid on Bungeling Bay was the first video game designed by Will Wright. It was published by Brøderbund for the Commodore 64 in 1984 and the NES and MSX computers in 1985. The Commodore 64 version was published in the UK by Ariolasoft, and the NES version was ported by Hudson Soft.
info:
• 中文名: 救难直升机
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1984
